sentences.en: A good dinner will appease your hunger.
sentences.cn: 丰盛的晚餐将为你充饥.

sentences.en: Be helpful for lighten asthma or cough. Appease nerve and blue mood.
sentences.cn: 有助于减轻气喘、咳嗽等症状, 安抚神经,消除紧张心理和低沉情绪.

sentences.en: Can you appease the boy's curiosity?
sentences.cn: 你能满足这个男孩的好奇心 吗 ?

sentences.en: Dispel unpleasant smells. Stimulate appetite. Appease vehemency and depression.
sentences.cn: 祛除异味, 刺激食欲, 赶山肠胃,安抚焦虑、愤怒、沮丧.

sentences.en: Gandhi was accused by some of trying to appease both factions of the electorate.
sentences.cn: 一些人指责甘地试图安抚两派选民。

sentences.en: He hunted up a restaurant to appease his hunger.
sentences.cn: 他好容易找到一家餐馆去填饱肚子.

sentences.en: He said he could eat an elephant to appease his hunger.
sentences.cn: 他说他吃光一头大象才能充饥.

sentences.en: He tried to appease his angry mother with kind words.
sentences.cn: 他试图用宽厚的话抚慰愤怒的母亲.

sentences.en: He tried to appease the crying child by giving him candy.
sentences.cn: 他试图给那个啼哭的孩子糖果使他不哭.

sentences.en: His attempts to appease her only added fuel to the fire.
sentences.cn: 他试着安抚她,结果却造成火上加油的局面.

sentences.en: It would be fun to appease the appetite of hungry people.
sentences.cn: 满足饥饿者的胃口会很有趣.

sentences.en: Nothing could appease the crying child.
sentences.cn: 什么都无法使孩子不哭.

sentences.en: There was a clever attempt to appease the people.
sentences.cn: 这是平息人们怒火的好方法.

sentences.en: They attempted to appease international opposition by promising to hold talks.
sentences.cn: 他们答应举行会谈，试图以此平息国际上的反对声音。

sentences.en: We will appease our enemies so that we may live.
sentences.cn: 我们将与敌人讲和,这样我们能生活下去.

sentences.en: When he is in a wax, nobody can appease him.
sentences.cn: 当他发怒时, 无人能劝慰他.

words.tran_cn: 缓和得了的；劝解得了的；平息得了的

trans.tran_en: to make someone less angry or stop them from attacking you by giving them what they want

trans.tran_cn: 平息， 抚慰； 姑息
trans.tran_en: to make someone less angry or stop them from attacking you by giving them what they want
